{% extends "layout.html" %} {% block title %} Quizzes {% endblock %} {% block content %} {% filter markdown %} ## Your new hobby is: # Quizzes A quiz is a form of game or mind sport in which players attempt to answer questions correctly about a certain or variety of subjects. Quizzes can be used as a brief assessment in education and similar fields to measure growth in knowledge, abilities, or skills. They can also be televised for entertainment purposes, often in a game show format. Find out more on [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quiz)! {% endfilter %} {% endblock %}
